experience.title: Senior Software Developer
bullets: Engineered scalable medical automation solutions, reducing manual workflows by 60% and improving operational efficiency.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate complex customer problems into robust technical solutions.

experience.title: Software Developer
bullets: Developed and integrated advanced AI and NLP features into a contract management platform, improving document processing efficiency by 25%.

experience.title: Software Developer
bullets: Managed and optimized systems handling 50,000+ tasks per project for a task management system, ensuring high availability and performance.

projects.name: Linklee.in - Custom Link Management Platform
bullets: Architected and deployed a full-stack link management platform, handling 10,000+ daily inputs with 99.9% uptime.
Implemented custom subdomain functionality using Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Redis, enhancing user experience and platform flexibility.
Optimized data retrieval and caching strategies with Redis and Cloudflare, significantly improving application performance and scalability.
